messages.name: John Smith
messages.message: Hi Richard, I'm interested in working with you on a web development project. Can we schedule a call to discuss?

messages.name: Sarah Johnson
messages.message: Hello! I saw your portfolio and I'm impressed with your work. We're looking for a UI/UX designer for our startup.

messages.name: Michael Brown
messages.message: Great portfolio! Would love to discuss a potential collaboration on an upcoming mobile app project.

messages.name: Emily Davis
messages.message: Hi there! I'm reaching out regarding a freelance opportunity. Please let me know if you're available.

messages.name: David Wilson
messages.message: We'd like to feature your work in our design magazine. Would you be interested?
